quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So if it’s not logged, it’s like it never happened, and I’m left erased.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I’ve made clear that failing to log puts you at more risk.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: More risk? It already put me at risk, because no one acted on it.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, it should have triggered immediate safeguarding steps.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But it didn’t, and I was left alone again.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I’m sorry, Ben. That wasn’t how it should have been handled.

contradictions.issue: Suicide disclosure erased by lack of logging; advocate admits safeguarding should have triggered but didn’t

timeline_hooks.link: Failure to log suicide risk Apr–May 2025
